value:
$WmMPID_総選挙ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|Fascinating... So if I understand
correctly, Princess... You and I had
similar dreams?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|I believe so. And it was a rather odd
one at that. In an unfamiliar world,
standing before a sea of people...$k$pAll of them calling out—cheering—for
us. And I remember a particular name...
It was $Nu.$k$pI wonder if that dream has something
to do with why we're here.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|That seems likely. But for now, it looks
like we need to fight in order to keep
up our end of the contract.$k$pI'll be counting on you, Princess
Lucina.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|And I you!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_総選挙ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|I expected nothing less from these
otherworldly Heroes. Princess Lucina,
we should retreat for now.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|Agreed.$k$pBut there's something about the
enemy tactician that feels so...
Familiar...$k$p$Sbs150|
